<bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:37:20:4" default="NO" valid="yes">37, 20, 4</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Veg.</author> 5, 77</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">asinum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:tlg,0527,001:22:3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Vulg.</author> Gen. 22, 3</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n45365.10" n="4" level="3"> In gen., <hi rend="ital">to cover</hi>, <hi rend="ital">spread</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">argento sternunt iter omne viarum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0550,001:2:626" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Lucr.</author> 2, 626</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">foliis nemus Multis et algā litus inutili tempestas Sternet,</quote> <trans><tr>will strew over</tr>, <tr>bestrew</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,001:3:17:12" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Hor.</author> C. 3, 17, 12</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">congeriem silvae vellere summam,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:9:236" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 9, 236</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">litora nive,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1035,001:5:175" default="NO"><author>Val. Fl.</author> 5, 175</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">harenam Circi chrysocolla,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:33:90" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 33, 5, 27, § 90</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">solum telis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:9:666" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 9, 666</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">Tyrrhenas valles caedibus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1345,001:6:602" default="NO"><author>Sil.</author> 6, 602</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">strati bacis silvestribus agri,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,002:2:183" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> G. 2, 183</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ante aras terram caesi stravere juvenci,</quote> <trans><tr>covered</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:8:719" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> A. 8, 719</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n45365.11" n="B" level="2"> <hi rend="ital">To stretch out by flinging down</hi>, <hi rend="ital">to throw down</hi>, <hi rend="ital">stretch on the ground</hi>, <hi rend="ital">throw to the ground</hi>, <hi rend="ital">overthrow</hi>, <hi rend="ital">prostrate</hi> (mostly <usg type="style">poet.</usg>, esp. in Verg.; in prose not before the Aug. period; in Cic. only once in the trop. sense; <xr><lbl>v.</lbl> <ref type="sym" targOrder="U">the foll.</ref></xr>; cf. <cit><quote lang="la">profligo): cujus casus prolapsi cum proximos sterneret,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:5:47" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 5, 47</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">circa jacentem ducem sterne Gallorum catervas,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:7:26:8" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 7, 26, 8</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">turbam invadite ac sternite omnia ferro,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:24:38:7" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 24, 38, 7</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">alius sit fortis in armis, Sternat et adversos Marte favente duces,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0660,001:1:10:30" default="NO"><author>Tib.</author> 1, 10, 30</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">caede viros,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:10:119" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 10, 119</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">aliquem leto,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 8, 566</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">morte,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 11, 796</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:31:21:15" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 31, 21, 15</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:12:604" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 12, 604</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">adversā prensis a fronte capillis Stravit humi pronam,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,010:2:477" default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 2, 477</bibl></cit>: primosque et extremos Stravit <cb n="STER" /> humum, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,001:4:14:32" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Hor.</author> C. 4, 14, 32</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">sternitur volnere,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:10:781" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 10, 781</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">impetus per stratos caede hostes,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:4:29:1" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 4, 29, 1</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">aliquem morti,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:12:464" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 12, 464</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">irae Thyesten exitio gravi Stravere,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,001:1:16:18" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Hor.</author> C. 1, 16, 18</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">corpore toto Sternitur in vultus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1020,001:12:318" default="NO"><author>Stat.</author> Th. 12, 318</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">sternitur, et toto projectus corpore terrae,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:11:87" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 11, 87</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">toto praecipitem sternit,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1345,001:4:182" default="NO"><author>Sil.</author> 4, 182</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">hostes,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2806,001:2:11:13" default="NO"><author>Just.</author> 2, 11, 13</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">Ajax stravit ferro pecus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,004:2:3:202" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Hor.</author> S. 2, 3, 202</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">sternitur et procumbit humi bos,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:5:481" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 5, 481</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">strata belua texit humum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,002:10:106" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> H. 10, 106</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">rapidus torrens Sternit agros, sternit sata laeta,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:2:306" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 2, 306</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">moenia,</quote> <trans><tr>to overthrow</tr>, <tr>demolish</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:12:550" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 12, 550</bibl></cit>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">stratis ariete muris,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:1:29:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 1, 29, 2</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">sternit a culmine Trojam,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:2:603" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 2, 603</bibl></cit>; so, <cit><quote lang="la">(elephanti) stabula Indorum dentibus sternunt,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:8:27" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 8, 9, 9, § 27</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n45365.12" n="2" level="3"> <usg type="style">Trop.</usg> (rare): <cit><quote lang="la">deorum plagā perculsi, afflictos se et stratos esse fatentur,</quote> <trans><tr>cast down</tr>, <tr>prostrated</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,049:3:29:72" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Tusc. 3, 29, 72</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">mortalia corda Per gentes humiles stravit pavor,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,002:1:331" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> G. 1, 331</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">virtus populi Romani haec omnia strata humi erexit ac sustulit,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:26:41:12" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 26, 41, 12</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">stratā Germaniā,</quote> <trans><tr>subdued</tr>,</trans> <bibl default="NO"><author>Amm.</author> 16, 1, 5</bibl></cit>.—Hence, <orth extent="full" lang="la">strātus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <hi rend="ital">P. a.;</hi> as <hi rend="ital">substt.</hi> </sense><sense id="n45365.13" n="A" level="2"> <orth extent="full" lang="la">strāta</orth>, <itype>ae</itype>, <gen>f.</gen> (sc. via), <hi rend="ital">a paved road</hi> or <hi rend="ital">way</hi> (post-class.), <bibl default="NO"><author>Eutr.</author> 9, 15</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">amplas sternite jam stratas,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Juvenc.</author> 1, 315</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">in margine stratae,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> 3, 656</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n45365.14" n="B" level="2"> <orth extent="full" lang="la">strātum</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, <gen>n.</gen> (mostly <usg type="style">poet.</usg> and in post-Aug. prose; not in Cic.; acc. to II. A.).—</sense><sense id="n45365.15" n="1" level="3"> <hi rend="ital">A bed-covering</hi>, <hi rend="ital">a coverlet</hi>, <hi rend="ital">quilt</hi>, <hi rend="ital">blanket; a pillow</hi>, <hi rend="ital">bolster</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">lecti mollia strata,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0550,001:4:849" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Lucr.</author> 4, 849</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">proripere se e strato,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=cal.:51" default="NO"><author>Suet.</author> Calig. 51</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:5:34" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 5, 34</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">10, 267</bibl>.— </sense><sense id="n45365.16" n="b" level="4"> <usg type="style">Meton.</usg> (pars pro toto), <hi rend="ital">a bed</hi>, <hi rend="ital">couch</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">haud segnis strato surgit Palinurus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:3:513" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 3, 513</bibl></cit>; cf. <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 8, 415</bibl>; <cit><quote lang="la">3, 176: tale,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0588,001:Ages. 8" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Nep.</author> Ages. 8</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">quies neque molli strato neque silentio arcessita,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:21:4:7" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 21, 4, 7</bibl></cit>.—<hi rend="ital">Plur.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">strataque quae membris intepuere tuis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,002:10:54" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> H. 10, 54</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">dura,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,001:1:2:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Am. 1, 2, 2</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0917,001:1:239" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Luc.</author> 1, 239</bibl>.—Once also (sc. lectus) in the <hi rend="ital">masc.</hi>, Favorin. ap. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1254,001:15:8:2" default="NO"><author>Gell.</author> 15, 8, 2</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n45365.17" n="2" level="3"> <hi rend="ital">A horsecloth</hi>, <hi rend="ital">housing</hi>, <hi rend="ital">a saddle</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:8:33" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 8, 33</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:7:14:7" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 7, 14, 7</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1014,001:Ep. 80:9" default="NO"><author>Sen.</author> Ep. 80, 9</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:7:202" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 7, 56, 57, § 202</bibl>. —Prov.: <cit><quote lang="la">qui asinum non potest, stratum caedit (v. asinum),</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Petr.</author> 45, 8</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n45365.18" n="3" level="3"> <hi rend="ital">A pavement</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">saxea viarum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0550,001:1:315" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Lucr.</author> 1, 315</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0550,001:4:415" default="NO" valid="yes">4, 415</bibl>: extraneum, Petr. poët. 55, 6, 11.</sense></entryFree>
